IORWLockRead FunctionIORWLockReadDriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOSvoid IORWLockRead(struct IORWLock * lock); Parameters lockPointer to the allocated lock.

Lock a read/write lock for read.

Lock the lock for read, allowing multiple readers when there are no writers. If the lock is held for write, block waiting for its unlock. Locking the lock recursively from one thread, for read or write, can result in deadlock.

# IORWLockRead | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

- [ IORWLockRead ](/documentation/driverkit/iorwlockread)

-  IORWLockRead 

Function# IORWLockRead

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
void IORWLockRead(struct IORWLock * lock);
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/driverkit/iorwlockread#parameters)

`lock`Pointer to the allocated lock.

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/iorwlockread#discussion)

Lock a read/write lock for read.

Lock the lock for read, allowing multiple readers when there are no writers. If the lock is held for write, block waiting for its unlock. Locking the lock recursively from one thread, for read or write, can result in deadlock.
